Package toystore.productline

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Manufacturer
    Used to describe a manufacturer's characteristics, with a name and a number of products associated with it.
    Product
    Used to describe a product's characteristics, with an unique identifier, name, manufacturer associated with it, price, quantity in stock and discount.
    ProductBuilder
    Builder for Product, using the Builder design pattern for initializing only the field we want from Product.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    DuplicateManufacturerException
    Checked exception, used to assure uniqueness of Manufacturer objects, not allowing multiple manufacturers of the same kind to exits in the singleton Store Uniqueness is determined by the name of the manufacturer.
    DuplicateProductException
    Checked exception, used to assure uniqueness of Product objects, not allowing multiple products of the same kind to exits in the singleton Store Uniqueness is determined by the uniq_id field.
    RequestTooManyProducts
    Checked exception that is thrown when the user requests more products than the quantity the Store has of that product.
